name: Vegetarian Tortilla Dog
author: RENEE86
summary: Here's a fast vegetarian lunch treat: a veggie dog enclosed in melted cheese and a warm tortilla, made in the microwave. You can also add your favorite chili beans before rolling.
directions: Place hot dog on a microwave-safe plate and heat on High until warm, about 30 seconds
Place tortilla on a microwave-safe plate, and heat on High until warm, about 15 seconds
Lightly spread the tortilla with margarine
Place the cheese slice on the tortilla, and top with the hot dog
Fold the ends of the tortilla in over the hot dog and roll to close
Heat the tortilla dog in microwave on High until cheese melts, about 30 more seconds
